import React, { useState } from 'react' const ReportingPage = () => { const [city, setCity] = useState('Shakopee') const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [explanation, setExplanation] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [picture, setPicture] = useState('') const submitReport = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setCity('Shakopee') setTitle('') setExplanation('') setEmail('') setPicture('') } return (
submitReport(e)}>

) } export default ReportingPage
